acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: If this element contains a navigation section, it is recommended that it be marked up as a list.
This select element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title , aria-label , aria-labelledby .
This select element does not have a value available to an accessibility API.

This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
If this selection list contains groups of related options, they should be grouped with optgroup.

This form does not contain a submit button, which creates issues for those who cannot submit the form using the keyboard. Submit buttons are INPUT elements with type attribute "submit" or "image", or BUTTON elements with type "submit" or omitted/invalid.
